name: tasmoadmin
description: TasmoAdmin is a self-hosted administration panel for managing Tasmota-flashed IoT devices. It allows firmware updates, configuration, and monitoring from a centralized UI.
features: Device discovery: Automatically discover Tasmota devices on your network for centralized management.
Firmware updates: Update firmware across multiple devices simultaneously from a single interface.
Configuration management: View and modify device configurations including WiFi, MQTT, and module settings.
Device monitoring: Monitor device status, uptime, and sensor readings in real-time from a unified dashboard.
Bulk operations: Perform actions on multiple devices at once for efficient fleet management.
Command execution: Send custom commands to devices individually or in groups for advanced control.
Backup and restore: Save device configurations and restore them after firmware updates or device replacement.
Device grouping: Organize devices into groups for easier navigation and batch operations.
Status overview: View all devices at a glance with health indicators and connectivity status.
Web-based access: Manage your Tasmota devices from any browser without installing client software.
Update scheduling: Schedule firmware updates during maintenance windows to minimize disruption.
Configuration templates: Apply standard configurations to new devices for consistent setup.
